response.overview: Nate and Nathan, inseparable friends since childhood, vow during their high school years to prioritize their friendship above all, especially in matters of love. Following a heart-wrenching split from his long-term girlfriend Denise, Nate embarks on a journey of self-exploration, only to return a year later with a newfound certainty that Denise is his destined partner. However, upon his return, he discovers a shocking secret about his hometown that shatters his previous beliefs. Now, Nate faces the challenging dilemma of honoring their loyalty pact or potentially sacrificing his chance with Denise for good.
response.title: Friendship Love and Loyalty
